content: finished size is 24 x 90 inches **gauge ** 5 sps make 1 inches 2 double_crochet and 2 single_crochet row make 1-1/2 inches **materials ** * 20 balls of speed-cro-sheen art c 44 color no 126 spanish red * milward s steel crochet hook no 2/0 double zero * 4 cards of yellow rick-rack braid no 29 * 21 metal rings
